item.title: Help and Training
item.description:
Welcome!

This section focuses on the perspective of members, moderators, and administrators in their daily use of Vanilla. It includes lots of tutorials and tips for getting the most out of Vanilla. Use it to learn more about what is possible with Vanilla and to setup your new forum in a way that best suits your unique community.

From the blog

We've collected some helpful articles from our blog that might be useful to you as your build your community.

5 Tips for Launching a Community

Where do you start when building a community from scratch? We share some practical steps to follow when launching a brand new community.
Mistakes To Avoid When Promoting Your Community

Your social media and marketing channels can work to help your community succeed, but you need to plan properly to use them effectively.
Five Tips to Help Your Community Succeed

A community is not something you can just 'build' and hope people will come. It takes work and planning.
